plot: Muscat Tyler is the 108th prince of the Galaxy Empire, who is known as the eccentric persons. He travels around the universe accompanying a Walking Arsenal, K.K, and Lu of the Light Wing Race, the strongest creature in the universe. Where they go, there is a trouble.
ending_theme: "DoDoDo Pink Power" (DoDoドピンク・パワー) by Hiroko Kasahara
insert_song: "Tsuyoi-ko Ruu" (強い子・ルウ) by Hiroko Kasahara
